comments.body: Webmixer your Bitcoin Mixeryour (this word is connecting so its scale should be reduced at least several times).I would also be grateful if some kind of unobtrusive background was added (so that it would be more similar to the original banner)

comments.body: An ideal block (it will be easy to manipulate the color scheme in the future).Can we try putting this block in a frame?

comments.author: WEB503
comments.body: Here you need a black background (the edges are the same black as in the background of the first block, but with a light tint in the middle). Considering that in 2 weeks the main color scheme will change, the blue background will have no place in the new design... so the black gradient background seems reasonable to me as it will suit both the current design and the future one.

comments.author: WEB503
comments.body: Sorry to criticize but I think this can be improved.I found a great "onion" among your old designs. Can we try putting this design in a frame? (so that the length and width of the frame are identical to the second block. Only I think the background for the word ‚ÄúTOR‚Äù should be removed. The colors of the onion should be left as they are for now.... I would like to see how it will look.But I would be grateful if you showed how this block will look like (accet via, Tor -¬† black, frame color - black ... as in block 2, "onion" is black and red).

comments.body: I would also be grateful if you showed me one more option in which the frames will be completely absent. I believe that due to this we will be able to achieve an increased size of the texts and the onion.Don't create a signature for the SR just yet (until we finish the main design for the Legendary).
